Since I lack the skills to make this, I will request it here.

The past few days, I managed to fly a (SP+) SSTO Spaceplane to Laythe and back for the first time ever.

This got me thinking. If I could 'build' a lab in the cargobay, I could cruise the whole solar system and rake in a lot of science point, with just one plane (and some refuelling stations).

So, could anyone be bothered to make a lab module that fits inside the SP+/Stock cargobay (and make my day)?

Like this one? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94018-Better-Science-Labs?p=1420846

Or you could use Tweakscale to resize the stock science lab.

Like this one? http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94018-Better-Science-Labs?p=1420846

Or you could use Tweakscale to resize the stock science lab.

Well, I meant diamond shaped like the cargo bay, but this is a start.
